オプション1:
Not satisfied with just a few sips, Star Man drank all the rainwater around him.
After that he looked toward where the flying object had been, but he couldn't see it.
(Maybe it was light reflecting off the waves...)

After that, when he sat to rest, he was
immediately struck by stomach pain and had diarrhea.
Even so, his thirst was better than before he drank the rainwater.
(My head hurts too... but I can probably move a little.)

On the other side of the shore was a forest.
It was untouched by people,
but there was enough space for someone to walk.
